wikipedia_page.main: Solomon Alexander Hart  (April 1806 – 11 June 1881) was a British painter and engraver. He was the first Jewish member of the Royal Academy in London and was probably the most important Jewish artist working in England in the 19th century.

response: *Solomon Hart – Milton Visiting Galileo when a Prisoner of the Inquisition
